Geoffrey Rothschild (amụrụ n'afọ 1947) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke JSE Limited.
A mụrụ Geoffrey Rothschild na March 20, 1947 na Johannesburg, South Africa. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ruo eruo dị ka C.A

Rothschild malitere ọrụ ya na JSE Limited na 1960s. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị isi oche ya site na 2000 ruo 2008. Ọ bụ onye isi nke Corporate Marketing & Communications. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche ya. O jere ozi dị ka onye isi gọọmentị na ihe gbasara mba ụwa na JSE. O mepere ahịa ahụ na 23 Machị 2015, mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Board of Directors nke Sasfin Frankel Pollak Securities Ọ bụ onye otu National Advisory Council for Innovation na South African Institute of Stockbrokers Ọ na-eje ozi na Board of Directors nke NEPAD Business Foundation.
Ọ bi na Gauteng, South Africa.
